title: philipma1957
author: philipma1957
content: Nice to see it ship early. I await the 30% off coupon for next purchase.Also I will be billed import tax of 600-750So 2083 + 750 = 2833 for 100th and the 30% coupon.I would like to get another unit lets see 1950 x .7 = 1365 + shipping + import duty likely 2k for it.so 200th for about 4833. meh its okay I guess.it would be nice to get the s19 by saturday more likely monday.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: An excellent plan considering that even taking into account the price reduction on the A1246 to $3072, after Canaan introduced the new flagship A1366, $4833 for the 200th is better than $6142 for the 192Th.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on October 24, 2022, 04:26:30 PMAn excellent plan considering that even taking into account the price reduction on the A1246 to $3072, after Canaan introduced the new flagship A1366, $4833 for the 200th is better than $6142 for the 192Th.We have some Canaan I used them for almost 10 years.400 series700 series800 series the 842 was a nice unit900 series 1000 series1100 series1200 seriesbut I did not realize they made the A1366 have to look at it.The room is almost filled.maybe we do the pair of 100th from bitmain and try the A1366 from Canaan

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on October 24, 2022, 10:41:09 PMQuote from: Daltonik on October 24, 2022, 04:26:30 PMAn excellent plan considering that even taking into account the price reduction on the A1246 to $3072, after Canaan introduced the new flagship A1366, $4833 for the 200th is better than $6142 for the 192Th.We have some Canaan I used them for almost 10 years.400 series700 series800 series the 842 was a nice unit900 series 1000 series1100 series1200 seriesbut I did not realize they made the A1366 have to look at it.The room is almost filled.maybe we do the pair of 100th from bitmain and try the A1366 from Canaan It is not clear, however, how much the upcoming A1346 / A1366 miners will cost, for wholesalers for the purchase of 100 pieces in Q4 2022, Canaan offers to get a special voucher.https://twitter.com/canaanio/status/1585121157686394883

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: So no coupon and worse I get a reply from bitmain asking me why am I due a coupon.I have to say when things go wrong it is sad.I will continue to post to let you know if they give me this coupon.The reason I purchased the s19 pro was to get the coupon.At times life can get you angry but I will be persistent ,polite and professional.@ bitmain please send my coupon after you read this.
